Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Saybrook Plaza offers an investor an immediate value-add opportunity to increase gross income significantly via lease-up of the remaining 154,872 SF of vacant space. Additionally, an investor can create further value through creative restructuring of pads through disposition and redevelopment of existing pad infrastructure.
SIZE: 205,917 SF (Giant Eagle not included in GLA)
KEY TENANTS: Big Lots, Verizon, GetGo, H&R Block
High performing Grocery Store anchor, Giant Eagle, with recent 10 Year renewal (shadow anchored)
Extreme value-add upside and repositioning strategy
Minimal shopping center competition in the market
riced at a fraction of the replacement cost with future redevelopment potential

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Shadow Anchored by Giant Eagle, Saybrook Plaza is home to the only full-service grocery store in Ashtabula with the nearest Giant Eagle location over 16 minutes away. Giant Eagle at Saybrook Plaza not only offers full-service grocery but also
includes a drive-thru pharmacy and state liquor agency making it a high performing store for the brand.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE, Inc is pleased to exclusively offer the opportunity to acquire Saybrook Plaza, a 205,917 square foot community center located in Ashtabula, OH. The center is anchored by Giant Eagle (not owned) and Big Lots and features a desirable small shop tenant line-up with Verizon Wireless, CosmoProf, H&R Block, GetGo Gas Station and more. Giant Eagle, the #1 Market Share Grocer in the Cleveland MSA, recently renewed next door showing further commitment to the center.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: IMMEDIATE VALUE ADD INVESTMENT HIGH PERFORMING GROCERY SHADOW ANCHORED CENTER

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: GUARANTEED LEASE WITH VERIZON’S LARGEST AUTHORIZED RETAILER WITH OVER 1,000+ LOCATIONS NATIONWIDE.
TWO BRAND NEW HVAC UNITS INSTALLED IN MAY OF 202 1 .
THE SITE IS LOCATED ACROSS FROM A HIGH PERFORMING GIANT EAGLE AND BIG LOTS WITH MAJOR REDEVELOPMENT PLANS FOR THE SHOPPING CENTER UNDERWAY.
TWO BRAND NEW HVAC UNITS INSTALLED IN MAY OF 202 1 .
POTENTIAL FOR AN INVESTOR TO CREATE A PICK-UP WINDOW, WHICH HAS BEEN SOUGHT AFTER IN THE CURRENT CLIMATE.
VERIZON IS ONE OF LARGEST COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGY COMPANIES IN THE WORLD. FOUNDED IN 2000, THE COMPANY OPERATES AMERICA’S MOST RELIABLE WIRELESS NETWORK.

UNENCUMBERED ASSET - OFFERED FREE AND CLEAR OF ANY EXISTING FINANCING, A NEW INVESTOR CAN TAKE ADVANTAGE OF HISTORICALLY LOW INTEREST RATES AND AMPLE AVAILABILITY IN THE CAPITAL MARKETS TO ENHANCE RETURNS THROUGH CREATIVE CAPITALIZATION STRUCTURES.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The Site is located across from a high performing Giant Eagle and Big Lots with a major redevelopment plans for the shopping center underway.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present an exclusive opportunity to acquire a single tenant Verizon in Ashtabula, Ohio. This Verizon offering was constructed in 1992 and is a Triple Net (NNN) retail investment. The building is 4,800 rentable square feet on .69 acres of land. The initial lease term commenced in 2011 as ownership recently renewed the lease for another 2 years through March 2023.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Exclusive opportunity to acquire a single tenant Verizon in Ashtabula, Ohio.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Prime 8.7 AC development site with signalized access and 3 curb cuts - ideal for multifamily or retail development.

This is the largest used-car dealership opportunity in the Mentor market. A used car dealership can only be in operation in conjunction with a new car dealership. • Mitsubishi is now closed at this location.
37,800 SF New & Used Auto Dealership on 8.7 AC on Mentor Avenue! • Over 30,000 SF service & parts department • 6,300 SF auto show room

Traffic counts of 22,975 VPD (Source ODOT) on Mentor Avenue. • The site features 3 Mentor Avenue curb cuts and a traffic light with a dedicated left turn-lane. • Over 630’ of frontage on Mentor Avenue!
The market has a 5 mile population of 102,722 people and daytime population of 99,580 people in a 5 mile radius.

Mentor is one of the largest retail markets in the state. The property is located minutes from Great Lakes Mall corridor, which features many new to market retailers and restaurants including Round One Entertainment, Hobby Lobby, CoreLife Eatery, BJ’s Brewhouse, At Home, Slymans, Burgerim and more!
